mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET read_cnt = NVL(read_cnt,0)+1 WHERE bd_seq = #{bdSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT bd_seq as bdSeq, nickname AS nickName, category, title, contents, read_cnt AS readCnt, recommendation, csnm, TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS regDt, reg_id AS regId, TO_CHAR(mod_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS modDt, mod_id AS modId FROM BOARD WHERE bd_seq = #{bdSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET nickname = #{nickName}, category = #{category}, title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, read_cnt = #{readCnt}, recommendation = #{recommendation}, csnm = #{csnm}, mod_dt = SYSDATE, mod_id = #{modId} WHERE bd_seq = #{bdSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( bd_seq, nickname, category, title, contents, read_cnt, recommendation, csnm, reg_dt, reg_id, mod_dt, mod_id )VALUES ( BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{nickName}, #{category}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{readCnt}, #{recommendation}, #{csnm}, sysdate, #{regId}, sysdate, #{modId} )
